articles.title: The Suns built a superteam with Durant, Booker and Beal. It produced zero playoff wins - The Associated Press
articles.description: The Phoenix Suns thought they had built a formidable superteam during the offseason by adding three-time All-Star Bradley Beal to form a star-studded trio with Kevin Durant and Devin Booker. It looked great on paper. It added up to exactly zero playoff wins. …
